text: The False Alarm is a 1926 American silent drama film directed by Frank O'Connor and starring Ralph Lewis, Dorothy Revier and John Harron.Munden p.227 ==Cast== * Ralph Lewis as Fighting John Casey * Dorothy Revier as Mary Doyle * John Harron as Joe Casey * George O'Hara as Tim Casey * Priscilla Bonner as Bessie Flannigan * Mary Carr * Lillian Leighton as Mrs. Flannigan * Maurice Costello * Billy Franey * Arthur Hoyt ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1926 films Category:1926 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Columbia Pictures films Category:Films directed by Frank O'Connor Category:American black-and-white films
title: The False Alarm
